The seq/fold_left.hpp header defines macros for folding (or accumulating) a seq left-to-right.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/seq/fold_left.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOLD_LEFT
  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOLD_LEFT_s
